ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription: [npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldDog(deep sea snapper ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of #IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF deep sea snapper ears that are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
